DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the tolerability of a subcutaneous needle-free injection device used to administer Fuzeon, compared with the standard needle/syringe supplied with commercial Fuzeon. The anticipated time on study treatment is <3 months, and the target sample size is <100 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: WAND Study - A Study to Evaluate Fuzeon (Enfuvirtide) Administered by a Needle-Free Injection Device in Patients With HIV.
DOC.criteria: male or female patients, >=18 years of age with HIV1 infection; previously treated with antiretroviral agents. prior use of Fuzeon or T1249; inability to selfinject; active, untreated opportunistic infection.
